languages.text: {n}Идира бросает косой взгляд на Ардженту.{/n} "Сейчас вот дождемся, пока сестричка носик напудрит..."
{n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира бросает косой взгляд на Ардженту.{/n} "Сейчас вот дождемся, пока сестричка носик напудрит..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira side-eyes Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

{n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt Argenta schief an.{/n} "Geduld, allerseits. Die heilige Schwester hier ist bald fertig mit Nasepudern ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt Argenta von der Seite her an.{/n} "Geduld, allerseits. Die heilige Schwester hier ist bald fertig mit Nasepudern ..."

languages.text: {n}Idira lance un regard en coin à Argenta.{/n} « Un peu de patience, tout le monde. La sainte sœur a presque fini de se repoudrer le nez... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lance un regard en coin à Argenta.{/n} « Un peu de patience, tout le monde. La sainte sœur a presque fini de se repoudrer le nez... »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉斜着眼，瞥了阿洁塔一眼。{/n}“大家伙儿，耐心点儿，咱们的小圣女马上就要补完妆了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉瞥了阿洁塔一眼。{/n}“大家伙儿，耐心点儿，咱们的小圣女马上就要补完妆了……”

languages.text: {n}イディラはアルジェンタを不審そうに見ている。{/n}「我慢よ、みんな。このお妹さんのお化粧は、もうすぐ終わるから…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはアルジェンタを横目で見た。{/n}「我慢よ、みんな。このお妹さんのお化粧は、もうすぐ終わるから…」

languages.text: {n}Idira mira de reojo a Argenta.{/n} «Paciencia. La santa hermana casi ha terminado de empolvarse la nariz...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira mira de reojo a Argenta.{/n} «Paciencia. La santa hermana casi ha terminado de empolvarse la nariz...».

languages.text: {n}İdira, yan yan Argenta'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Biraz sabırlı olun millet. Yüce rahibemiz makyajını tazeledi sayılır."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks askance at Argenta.{/n} "Patience, everybody. Holy sis here is almost done powdering her nose..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, onaylamaz bir ifadeyle Argenta'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Sabır gösterin. Yüce rahibemiz makyajını tazeledi tazeleyecek..."
